name: SHADOW|TRAVELER
description:
A 2D Sci-fi Fantasy Horror Puzzle-Platformer that uses light and dark as major gameplay elements. Don’t trust the shadows or you may yet be swallowed by them.

Controls

  • Movement – WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Shoot – Left Mouse
  • Jump – Spacebar

Features:

  • Use various light sources to keep dark dwelling enemies at bay (and smartly avoid traps).
  • Sneak past light loving baddies in the dark. Don’t let them catch you!
  • Find the well-hidden, but powerful rare weapons (you’ll need these to defeat your toughest enemies).
  • Master the use of advanced equipment (it’s tricky!). Oh and don’t forget to keep an eye on your fuel levels.
  • Use element upgrades to survive intense heat, freezing cold, and a number of other harsh environmental hazards.
  • Travel from an age of highly advanced technology back to an age of magic and primordial technology.
